STATUTORY REFERENCE TABLE - (O.C.G.A.)
The ordinances of the City of Nashville were codified and published in 1980. At that time statutory references in this volume were cited to the 1933 Georgia Code. As pages are necessarily pulled for updating in the Supplement Service, state law references will be updated to reflect the 1981 Georgia Code (O.C.G.A.).
EXPAND
1933 Ga. Code
Section O.C.G.A.
Section  Section
this Code

12-4-72 24-3
12-5-20 et seq. 24-2
12-5-440 et seq. 24-2,
24-16(16)
5-2301a 12-7-1 24-4
